Use recipes

Source: vignettes/ech.Rmd
ech.Rmd

Obtener recetas 

library(metasurvey)
#> Welcome to: metasurvey version 0.0.2
#> use_copy: TRUE
#> metasurvey.engine: data.table
#> metasurvey.api.key: ********
#> metasurvey.user: public
#> metasurvey.lazy_processing: TRUE
recetas_mercado_trabajo <- get_recipe(
  "ech",
  "2022",
  topic = "ingreso"
)
#> The API returned 1 recipes
